Text: This plays fine on VLC player
Thanks, MDPROSSER.  You are a god among men.

This file is not XVID at all, it's encoded as H264! It has been badly mislabeled. Actual stats:

Video format: H264
Duration: 1:03:18
Frame rate: 23.976fps
Dimensions: 720 x 400
Audio: MP3 44100Hz 128 kb/s tot, Joint Stereo

The quality itself is fine, but if you intend to play it on an XVID only capable device you'll be disappointed and will have to convert it.
This is 720 x 400 H264 not XVID!
